frontmatter.title: First Call for Papers
frontmatter.description:
Dear Colleagues,
The Department of Modern Greek Studies, Faculty of Philology, University of Belgrade, is pleased to announce the 15<sup>th</sup> International Conference on Greek Linguistics, which will be held in Belgrade, 16-19 September 2021.
